org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.sasl

Class PlainServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.sasl.PlainServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SaslServer

    public class PlainServer
extends Object
implements SaslServer
    Implements the PLAIN SASL server-side mechanism. (RFC 4616) It processes a name callback for the authentication ID and a password callback for the associated password as well as an authorization callback for the given credentials.

        private void checkResponse(byte[] response)
                    throws SaslException
        Checks if the format of the received response is valid.
        Parameters:
        response - the response in raw bytes to check
        Throws:
        SaslException - if message format is not valid

      • tokenize

        private List<byte[]> tokenize(byte[] response)
        Splits the fields of the given response into a List of field tokens.
        Parameters:
        response - the raw response containing the fields
        Returns:
        a list of field tokens as raw byte arrays

      • authenticate

        private void authenticate(String authzid,
                String authcid,
                char[] password)
                   throws SaslException
        Authenticates the given credentials using callbacks.
        Parameters:
        authzid - the given authorization ID
        authcid - the given authentication ID
        password - the given password
        Throws:
        SaslException - if authentication fails due to credential mismatch or internal error.
